remarks: A graph with two (different) vertices is complete if and only if there is an edge between these two vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement: cusgra2v $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ A =/= B ) -> ( { A , B } USGrph E -> ( { A , B } ComplUSGrph E <-> { A , B } e. ran E ) ) ) $.
